channel.title: Using no-ip
channel.description: Ive created a no-ip adress (wwescape.no-ip.biz) but when i try put my server on the server status page it says it must be online! ive neva used a no-ip server before so what have i done wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 04:23:26 AM[/size][hr]no1 willing to help :(

item.title: Using no-ip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

port forwarding is a long and boring process.
Go to www.portforward.com
find your router, go to hamachi, skip all the hamachi stuff and then just do the port forwarding stuff.
Thats it.

Read full topic

how do i port forward my router?

Read full topic

item.title: Using no-ip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you need to port forward if you have a router.

That is why its saying it must be online.

A server listens on a port, rs2 p server mostly listen on 43594 so unless you open that port in your router people wont be able to connect to it because your router hasnâ€™t got that port open to access your server running on your computer.

Read full topic
